1.name: Animal Friendship
1.description: Convince a beast that you mean it no harm, charming it for a duration.

1.name: Armure d'Agathys
1.description: Create a protective layer of frost that grants temporary hit points and damages melee attackers.

1.name: Bras d'Hadar
1.description: Summon dark tendrils that erupt from you, damaging and restraining nearby foes.

1.name: Bane
1.description: Temporarily curse up to three creatures, imposing a penalty on their attack rolls and saving throws.

1.name: Bless
1.description: Bless up to three creatures, granting them a bonus on attack rolls and saving throws.

1.name: Burning Hands
1.description: Create a cone of flame that deals fire damage to each creature in the area.

1.name: Charm Person
1.description: Attempt to charm a humanoid creature, making it friendly towards you.

1.name: Chromatic Orb
1.description: Hurl a sphere of energy at a creature, dealing damage of a type you choose.

1.name: Colour Spray
1.description: Emit a dazzling array of flashing, colored lights that can blind creatures within the area.

1.name: Command
1.description: Speak a one-word command to a creature, forcing it to follow your order on its next turn.

1.name: Compelled Duel
1.description: Compel a creature to focus its attacks solely on you, ignoring other targets.

1.name: Create or Destroy Water
1.description: Either create water to extinguish fires or destroy water to dry up areas.

1.name: Cure Wounds
1.description: Restore hit points to a creature you touch.

1.name: Disguise Self
1.description: Alter your appearance to look like someone else until the spell ends.

1.name: Dissonant Whispers
1.description: Whisper a discordant melody that only one creature can hear, causing it psychic pain.

1.name: Divine Favor
1.description: Imbue your weapon attacks with divine energy, causing them to deal extra radiant damage.

1.name: Enhance Leap
1.description: Triple the jump distance of a creature you touch.

1.name: Ensnaring Strike
1.description: Your next attack summons thorny vines that can ensnare your target, restraining them and dealing piercing damage over time.

1.name: Entangle
1.description: Cause vines to sprout from the ground, creating difficult terrain and potentially restraining creatures within the area.

1.name: Expeditious Retreat
1.description: Allow yourself to move at an incredible pace, enabling you to Dash as a bonus action on each of your turns.

1.name: Faerie Fire
1.description: Illuminate creatures in a specific area, making them visible and granting advantage on attack rolls against them.

1.name: False Life
1.description: Bolster yourself with necromantic energy, gaining temporary hit points.

1.name: Feather Fall
1.description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range; their rate of descent slows, and they take no damage from falling.

components.material: a small feather or piece of down

1.name: Find Familiar
1.description: Summon a spirit that takes the form of an animal to aid you in combat and exploration.

1.name: Fog Cloud
1.description: Create a dense fog that heavily obscures an area, potentially blinding creatures within.

1.name: Goodberry
1.description: Conjure up to four magical berries that restore hit points when consumed.

1.name: Grease
1.description: Create a slick grease on the ground, turning it into difficult terrain and potentially causing creatures to fall prone.

1.name: Guiding Bolt
1.description: Launch a radiant bolt at a creature, dealing damage and making it easier for others to hit.

1.name: Hail of Thorns
1.description: Your next ranged weapon attack causes thorns to explode from the target, dealing piercing damage to nearby creatures.

1.name: Healing Word
1.description: A creature of your choice regains hit points. No effect on undead or constructs.

1.name: Hellish Rebuke
1.description: As a reaction when you take damage from a creature, point your finger at the attacker to engulf them in hellish flames.

1.name: Heroism
1.description: Imbue yourself or an ally with bravery, making them immune to being frightened and granting temporary hit points each turn.

1.name: Hex
1.description: Place a curse on a creature, dealing extra necrotic damage when you hit it with an attack and giving it disadvantage on ability checks of a chosen ability.

reapplyHex.description: If the target dies before the spell ends, you can use a bonus action to curse a new creature without expending a spell slot.

1.name: Hunter's Mark
1.description: Designate a creature as your quarry, dealing extra damage when you hit it with weapon attacks.

1.name: Ice Knife
1.description: Hurl a shard of ice that explodes, damaging the target and nearby creatures.

1.name: Inflict Wounds
1.description: Make a melee spell attack to deal necrotic damage to a creature you touch.

1.name: Longstrider
1.description: Increase a creature's movement speed by 10 feet (3 meters) until the spell ends.

1.name: Mage Armor
1.description: Protect an unarmored creature with a magical force, setting its base AC to 13 plus its Dexterity modifier.

1.name: Magic Missile
1.description: Create multiple darts of magical force that automatically hit their targets.

additional.targets: each dart can be directed at a different creature

1.name: Protection from Evil and Good
1.description: Protect a creature against certain types of creatures, granting various benefits.

1.name: Ray of Sickness
1.description: Fire a ray of toxic energy that damages and may poison a creature.

1.name: Sanctuary
1.description: Protect a creature from enemy attacks until it harms another creature.

effect.endsIf: the warded creature attacks or harms another creature

additional.note: Area spells can still affect the warded creature

1.name: Searing Smite
1.description: Your next melee weapon hit deals extra fire damage and may set the target ablaze.

1.name: Shield
1.description: As a reaction, you raise a magical barrier that increases your Armor Class and nullifies Magic Missile until the start of your next turn.

1.name: Shield of Faith
1.description: Create a shimmering field around a creature, granting it a bonus to Armor Class.

1.name: Sleep
1.description: Send creatures into a magical slumber, affecting a total of 24 hit points worth of creatures.

1.name: Speak with Animals
1.description: Gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for a duration.

1.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
1.description: Cause a creature to collapse into fits of laughter, rendering it prone and incapacitated.

1.name: Thunderous Smite
1.description: Your next melee weapon hit emits a thunderous boom, dealing extra thunder damage and possibly pushing the target away and knocking it prone.

1.name: Thunderwave
1.description: Create a wave of thunderous force that deals damage and pushes creatures and objects away from you.

1.name: Witch Bolt
1.description: Create a sustained arc of lightning between you and a creature, dealing initial damage and allowing you to deal automatic damage on subsequent turns.

1.name: Wrathful Smite
1.description: Your next melee weapon hit deals extra psychic damage and may frighten the target.
